Package uk.ac.cf.milling.utils.plotting

Class ChartXYZZoom

java.lang.Object
org.jzy3d.chart.controllers.AbstractController
org.jzy3d.chart.controllers.camera.AbstractCameraController
uk.ac.cf.milling.utils.plotting.ChartXYZZoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.NEWTEventListener, EventListener, org.jzy3d.chart.controllers.mouse.camera.ICameraMouseController
public class ChartXYZZoom extends org.jzy3d.chart.controllers.camera.AbstractCameraController implements com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener
Adds 3D zoom functionality to 3D graphs.
Integration to 2D graphs (for X,Y zoom) not tested.
Author:
Theocharis Alexopoulos
